text: Nummah moominiiney inni nafsil siinih xiibita immay, isin Nabii Ibraahim kee moominiinik kaâ luk yen maral meqe katayyu luk tenen ken kataytaanamal, addunyaa kee akeeral Yallak galtó qaagita marah, iimaan kee ambiyâ katayyut derre cabe numuh tugactek, diggah Yalli isi naqoosak gaddali, kulli caalatal faylali kinni
